channel.title: This is new.
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "This is new."

item.title: Re: This is new.
item.content:encoded: hes not thats double (aka+100%) chance to find an ally on a reaper mission. so if they are normaly a 1% chance they become a 2% find chance

item.title: Re: This is new.
item.content:encoded: I dunno why I thought it would either, I was thinking it would be better with MC if he was 100% ally drop.

item.title: Re: This is new.
item.content:encoded:
No, he means they aren't disabled. I believe Anonymous was confirmed to be non-disabled too.

However, I don't see why you would think it's a good way to farm note pages. If you're farming note pages, Hyuk + Olmek + Right2, always. Or if you don't have Right2, then The Paper instead.

item.title: Re: This is new.
item.content:encoded:
Allys except reaper allies are disabled on reaper missions.

And MC isn't item find chance anymore he is ally find chance

item.title: This is new.
item.content:encoded:
So apparently you can use Rightlv2. and Lisalisa in monochrome missions.
In tandem with MC Stripeypants this could probably be a good way to farm note pages.
